Package com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.format

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrowFormat
    Adds an up or down arrow to a numeric cell, depending on whether the value is above or below a specified base value.
    ArrowFormatOptions
    Configuration options for ArrowFormat.
    BarFormat
    Adds a colored bar to a numeric cell indicating whether the cell value is above or below a specified base value.
    BarFormatOptions
    Configuration options for BarFormat.
    ColorFormat
    Assigns colors to the foreground or background of a numeric cell, depending on the cell value.
    DateFormat
    Formats a Date value in a variety of ways, including "January 1, 2009," "1/1/09" and "Jan 1, 2009.
    DateFormatOptions
    Configuration options for DateFormat.
    NumberFormat
    Describes how numeric columns should be formatted.
    NumberFormatOptions
    Configuration options for NumberFormat.
    PatternFormat
    Enables you to merge the values of designated columns into a single column, along with arbitrary text.
